title: Saga / process manager
summary: Coordinate long-running, multi-step workflows with explicit state, timeouts, and compensation.

decisionGuidance.problemSolved: BizTalk orchestrations hide workflow state; modernization needs explicit coordination and recovery.
whenToUse: Workflows span multiple systems and time
Failures need compensation or manual recovery
whenNotToUse: A single system can complete the work transactionally in one step

thingsToWatchOutFor.opinionatedGuidance: Model sagas around business processes; keep state minimal; make timeouts explicit.

complexity.rationale: Workflow coordination is complex and operationally sensitive.
complexity.skillDemand: Distributed workflow design and failure-mode expertise.
complexity.operationalDemand: High—requires tracing, replay strategy, and runbooks.

realWorldExample.approach: Used a saga to manage delinquency → notice → cancel with timers and compensation.
realWorldExample.outcome: Predictable behavior and easier recovery than hidden orchestration.
